title: Import Definition file with invalid complex case field name in the 'SearchPartyDoB' column of the SearchCriteria tab
specs: contains correctly configured SearchParty tab with valid case field names in the SearchPartyName column
contains correctly configured SearchParty tab with valid case field names in SearchPartyEmailAddress, SearchPartyAddressLine1 and SearchPartyPostCode columns
contains invalid complex field name in the SearchPartyDoB column

body.__plainTextValue__: SearchPartyTab Invalid value 'RespondentDetails.InvalidRespondentName' is not a valid SearchPartyDOB value. The expression dot notation values should be valid caseTypes fields.
